description: Lexicographic ordering of N x N, where N = {1,2,3...}.
formula: a(2n) = A004736(n), a(2n+1) = A002260(n). - _Michael Somos_, Mar 06 2004Let p(i,j) be the position of (i,j) in the ordering. Then p(i,j) = ((i+j)^2-i-3j+2)/2. Inversely, the pair (i,j) in a given position p is given by i=p-q(q-1)/2 and j=q+1-i, where q=floor((1+sqrt(8k-7))/2).
